name: CQ.Ext.list.BooleanColumn
doc:
A Column definition class which renders boolean data fields.  See the xtype
config option of CQ.E...

configs.name: align
configs.doc: Set the CSS text-align property of the column. Defaults to 'left'.

configs.name: cls
configs.doc: Optional. This option can be used to add a CSS class to the cell of each row for this column.

configs.name: falseText
configs.doc: The string returned by the renderer when the column value is falsey (but not undefined) (defaults...

configs.name: header
configs.doc: Optional. The header text to be used as innerHTML (html tags are accepted) to display in the List...

configs.name: tpl
configs.doc: Optional. Specify a string to pass as the configuration string for CQ.Ext.XTemplate. By default a...

configs.name: trueText
configs.doc: The string returned by the renderer when the column value is not falsey (defaults to 'true').

configs.name: undefinedText
configs.doc: The string returned by the renderer when the column value is undefined (defaults to ' ').
